title: FL Studio API Stubs Model Config
description: Configuration file schema for the FL Studio API Stubs project

disallowDeprecated.description: Should calling a deprecated function raise an error?

disallowKeyEchoes.description: Should calling a function that echoes a keyboard shortcut raise an error?

targetFlVersion.description: The version of the FL Studio Python API that you are targeting.

unsupportedFunctionBehavior.description: The behavior that the API will take when trying to call a function that isn't supported in the targeted API version.
